content:
There's a new Participant Covid19 Registry being run by RUSH Medical in Chicago. Probably of interests to @Dave deBronkart. They claim to be 'standards based'.
https://www.hcinnovationgroup.com/covid-19/article/21132703/participantcentered-covid19-registry-ramps-up-fast
Shafiq has promised to share specifications for this with the FHIR community
